entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 28 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
